message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a great opportunity to secure an exceptional value for yourself while enjoying all the benefits this product has to offer.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.  This is a fair price that reflects the value I place on it, and I'm confident it's a good deal for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to engage in this negotiation. After considering your offer, I would like to propose a price of $10,500 for the product. This is a price that reflects its value while allowing for a reasonable profit margin for me. I hope this proposal works for you, and I look forward to your consideration.
